subject: Politics
title: Free Trade vs Protectionism
description: A short lesson to help you apply Free Trade vs Protectionism.

hook.text: Free trade creates winners and losers in the same country. The winners rarely compensate the losers.

buildup.text: Free trade lets countries specialize in what they do best. Protectionism shields domestic industries with tariffs.

discovery.text: China's entry into the WTO in 2001 boosted global growth but devastated manufacturing in the US and Europe.

twist.text: Every wealthy country used protectionism to develop. Free trade is preached once you're already on top.

climax.text: Trump's tariffs and Biden's industrial policy show that free trade's political consensus has collapsed.

punchline.text: Free trade grows the pie. The fight is always over who gets the slices.

quiz.question: How did wealthy nations historically develop their economies?
options: They used protectionism before advocating free trade
They always practiced free trade from the start
